summary: It's South Africa 1990. Two major events are about to happen: The release of Nelson Mandela and, more importantly, it's Spud Milton's first year at an elite boys only private boarding school.
cast: John Cleese|Troye Sivan|Jamie Royal|Sven Ruygrok|Blessing Xaba|Tom Burne|Josh Goddard|Travis Hornsby|Byron Langley|Jason Cope|Genna Blair|Charlbi Dean|Julie Summers|Aaron McIlroy|Tanit Phoenix Copley|Graham Weir|Ben Voss|Jeremy Crutchley|Siobhan Hodgson|Ryan Mayne|Darren Frances|James Murray|Ricky Cruz|Sylvaine Strike|Lehasa Moloi|Brenda Ngxoli|Terry Norton|Christine le Brocq|Matthew Butler|Chris Thomas|Ryan Holmes|Patrick Kenny|Alex McGregor|Shaeleen Tobin|Vera Clare|Liam Magner|Zhigiswa Madlala|Sandile Khuluse|Patricia Lourens|Paul Hartmann|Lana Ignjatovic|John Leslie Wright|Heather Conyngham|Karl Dreyer|Lee Manners-Wood|Jennifer Colenbrander|Robyn Grove|Stephen Embleton|Ian Steel|Bart Fouche|Annelie Mare|Danielle Pertman|Josh Dempers|Mel Cronje|Ross Garland|John Van De Ruit
keywords: private school|bully|teenage crush|teenage boy|character name as title
title: Spud
